flawed_nl_solution:
If Sally sold 30% more lemonade this week, she sold 20 * 30/100 = <<20*30/100=200/3>>200/3 more cups this week.
This week, Sally sold 20 + 200/3 = <<20+200/3=260/3>>260/3 cups of lemonade.
In total for both weeks, Sally sold 20 + 260/3 = <<20+260/3=320/3>>320/3 cups of lemonade.
#### 320/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 200/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
